channel.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
channel.description: So as far as I can figure I haven't been or done anything to have my ip banned from this site. I can get on through my phone and by using a proxy just fine but it won't work on any of my computers on my network. Every other website I go to works just fine, what gives?

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: rm249
item.description:
Give it a try now, I flushed the firewall blocks so if you were blocked you should be able to access it now.

Read full topic
item.source: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Drakey83:

Nothings working, ctrl+ f5 would only make sense if it was just one computer, none of my computers plus my phone on wifi won’t work.

This is the same thing that happens on my network. On mine sometimes a website will give me fits no matter if I bypass the router, clear my cache, or run it on a mobile system including my phone or 3ds. There’s no way for me to visit the site unless I ctrl+F5 I know it sounds odd, but it’s true.

Read full topic

item.source: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Instead of resetting the router, doing this and that to the router, updating the firmware to the router etc etc etc, simply bypass it and see if you can connect. If so, IT’S THE ROUTER.

bur:

it doesnt take 60 seconds if you dont have a laptop and your computer is nowhere near your router

He stated in his original post “it won’t work on any of my computers on my network.” That means he has other computers.

Read full topic
item.source: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
CPU:

Because bypassing the router only takes 60 seconds and if it works, then you’ve identified the problem as being the router and if it doesn’t work then you know it’s an IP block. Either way there’s no guessing.

it doesnt take 60 seconds if you dont have a laptop and your computer is nowhere near your router

Read full topic

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Briareos H:

How about checking whether his ip is cloudflare banned first, eh?

Because bypassing the router only takes 60 seconds and if it works, then you’ve identified the problem as being the router and if it doesn’t work then you know it’s an IP block. Either way there’s no guessing.

Drakey83:

Nothings working, ctrl+ f5 would only make sense if it was just one computer, none of my computers plus my phone on wifi won’t work.

That’s a sign that it’s an issue with your router. You need to test that by bypassing it and seeing if you can then connect successfully.

item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
This may sound odd, but when you go to the page and it says “connection timed out” try pressing ctrl+f5 to do a complete refresh of the page. With my ISP there are some pages that will not load correctly for me and sometimes not at all unless I do that.

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: Drakey83
item.description:
Never ran a TCP optimizer, I’ve played with every setting I could think of and finally just reset my router to its default settings… still nothing. I was trying to re-up a picture for my sig when I got kicked off, I think I did something wrong to freak out the website on the back end… so I was kinda hoping Hubicorn might be able to look into it. Please!

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Rather than change the DNS servers in Windows, I’d do it through the router, to guarantee it will work properly on all devices on that network. Check out opendns

item.source: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
ok that 2nd suggestion of mine was a joke (april 1st) so try this:

clear browser cache and check browser LAN setting (toggle between “auto detect” and “no proxy server”) then,

Start
search for: Network Connections
Right click on your active Local Area Connection and click Properties
Choose TCP/IP V4, Properties again and in the DNS boxes type 208.67.222.222 and 208.67.220.220

Read full topic
item.source: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?

item.source: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?

item.title: Blackmasasource.com only works for me through a proxy!?
item.dc:creator: Drakey83
item.description:
sersoft:

start+R

cmd

ipconfig /flushdns

reboot

try again

if that doesn’t work,

start+R

devmgmt.msc

delete all drivers

compmgmt.msc

delete all user accounts

diskmgmt.msc

format drive C:\

I did the ip address thing but it didn’t fix the problem. Everything else you suggested would only effect just my computer and not my network. I know it’s not just my computer because I’ve tried connecting with three different computers and my phone while it’s connected to wifi and none of them work.

Read full topic
